channel.title: Management Pack on Fletcher Kelly | Cloud Engineer

item.title: Service Requests – Re-assignment notification
item.description: So, in an effort to get my business ready for Service Requests as we use mainly Incidents and we are beginning our journey into Service Requests and differentiating between Service Requests (day to day operations) and Incidents (something is broken), I needed to reproduce a workflow to notify the “AssignedToUser” when a new Service Request is assigned to him or her.
